text:
Bradley Darryl "BD" Wong (born October 24, 1960) is an American actor. Wong won a Tony Award for his role as Song Liling in "M. Butterfly".
Wong is known for his role as Dr. George Huang on ', Dr. Henry Wu in the "Jurassic Park" franchise, his role in "Mr. Robot", and as Li Shang from the Disney animated movie "Mulan".
Wong appeared in the TV series "Gotham" as Hugo Strange.
